articles.author: Marly Rivera
articles.title: New York Yankees win, secure American League East crown as Aaron Judge stays at 60 homers - ESPN
articles.description: Gleyber Torres had three hits and three RBIs, Aaron Judge walked four times in pursuit of his 61st home run, and the New York Yankees outlasted the Toronto Blue Jays, 5-2, Tuesday night, officially securing the American League East crown.
articles.content:
TORONTO -- From a near August collapse to a late September clinch.
What seemed predestined when the New York Yankees were the best team in baseball in the first half of the season and looked doubtfu… [+3202 chars]
